author: R K
text: 'Staff here are ridiculous
column5: poor service.'

author: Anwar El Kamouny
text: 'The lady was taking my order while talking on the phone. I had to point at every item. Unprofessional attitude and poor communication.'

author: Adrian Geraci
text: "i dont like the attentions of the girls
column5: they make the sandwich like don't care what they do

author: Omar Perez
text: 'I came inside with my workers we were very patiently waiting I even let a guy on line go ahead of me just to wait a little longer so she takes her time when I decided to order and ask if I can go wash my hands she saids no screaming like the I saw a guy coming out of there with no problem so I just left horrible experience'

author: Rishabh Choudhary
text: 'This Subway employees don‚Äôt know how to make a sandwich. Plus employees were not wearing masks and gloves'

author: Dushal Patel
text: 'Nice job'

author: MAX POLOZANI
text:
'This place is a joke.
Says they close at 9pm and when you order online it allows you to order but the store is closed.

Good job subway!'

author: Benny Liang
text: 'Terrible service'

author: Varun Harnathka
text: 'The staff are absolutely amazing. Special mention for Kajal and Usha. They are extremely friendly
column5: skilled
column6: and quick on their feet. I usually order online and the estimated wait time is 20 minutes
column7: but my order is usually ready in less than 5 minutes. As a vegetarian
column8: I thought I was limited to just the veggie patty
column9: but they also went out of their way to suggest new varieties such as Falafel. They are always smiling
column11: and prompt. Since I was new to the area
column12: I asked them help for finding events happening in the city
column13: and they gladly helped me with that as well.\n\nAs for the taste
column14: they make the subs exactly as per my liking. Usually
column15: I have noticed that the subs are so filled that the veggies start popping out when you eat
column16: but they fit in all the toppings in such a way that it is just right.\n\nI would highly recommend it. Cheers.'

author: Vatsal Mehta
text: 'üëçüèº'

author: juan i gonzalez
text: 'Friendly employees and clean store'

author: Shraddha Chauhan
text: 'Did not toast my order wrong bread and put black olives in my order. Did not put any sauce. Messed up my order
column5: had to throw away and waste $10'

author: Chao Shi
text: 'nice place to have a sandwich'

author: Hector Pagan
text: 'Subway sliders impressed finicky me.\nTried the: Turkey one-- good as is\nThe cheese steak- better than expected.  And Italian spice-- needs more cheese and a veggie
column5: the pepperoni is to strong..  but great service.'

author: rajshree pawar
text: 'This subway is very clean and the employees are really helpful and welcoming. It‚Äôs a really nice experience to visit it .'

author: Maitrey Prajapati
text: "I'd give them minus if I can. They made very personal and vulgar comments on my appeal. Staff can't be any worse. They're always shouting and making fun of customers. Not a place to take family to."

author: Aries Zamora
text: "Clean
column5: great staff
column6: good sandwiches. The employee who opened this morning went above and beyond to make a sandwich tray for me at the last minute. She was absolutely amazing
column9: making my order and taking care of the customers coming in. Way to go! (I don't know how to write her name but she was working the morning shift today 10/9/19)."

author: Dorene Johnson
text: 'Clean restaurant quick service. Bread for sliders tasted old.'

author: Kanvi Gandhi
text: 'Friendly employees ...owesome place for to eat

author: German Martinez
text: 'Excellent food'

author: Salvatore Rubino
text: 'Eat fresh'

author: armando velasquez
text:
'(Translated by Google) Some sandwich as a lunch

(Original)
Unos sandwich como un almuerzo'

author: Mike Campanelli
text: 'Crazy expensive for a bread sandwich. You get like 2 slices of thinly sliced meat and one piece of cheese. I asked for chibatta bread that was extra. Combo was 10 bucks... I just wanted a sandwich not to help pay for a college education. Stay away'

text:

text: 'Great service'

text: 'Very nice place
column5: and great service'

author: Sandra Milosavljevic
text: 'Service was poor. Also
column5: they advertised mac&cheese all over the place but did not have it.'

author: Abhijit Valiathan
text: 'My experience at subway was pretty good. The staff there are extremely helpful and friendly. I also found the place to be very clean. All in all great experience.'

author: D T
text: 'Don‚Äôt sell me a drink then tell me you don‚Äôt have a working bathroom. (Based on the reviews hasn‚Äôt been working for 8+ months) Useless.\nPlus don‚Äôt try and charge me extra for bacon I didn‚Äôt ask for
column5: but you put on anyway

author: Doug Barnard
text: 'I should have listened to my friends Chris
column5: Chris
column7: and Jack. My dad and I decided to visit this Subway location for what we expected to be a wonderful father-son outing. Turns out
column8: these supposed ‚ÄúSandwich Artists‚Äù are actually professional SCAM ARTISTS!!!! They gave me a mere 4 thin cucumber slices on my sandwich and a deathly thin layer of meat. I SHALL NEVER RETURN!!!!'

author: CurlsnPearlsss
text: 'Staff was not friendly or helpful. I ended up leaving and going somewhere else.'

author: Balakumar Nair
text: 'My goodness
column5: these guys are stingy !!!! Subway sandwiches are usually good
column6: but not from this place. They just don‚Äôt want to add veggies to the sub. I asked for cucumber on a foot long and they put four thin slices on it. I asked for more and she added just one slice!!! I asked for lettuce and she literally sprinkled a few in a it. I probably could have counted the lettuce bits in it. Same goes for jalape√±os
column8: you name it. STAY AWAY from this place!!!'

author: Vishal Lakra
text: 'Quick healthy bite as usual....'

author: Vrujesh Patel
text: 'Very decent place. Staff is friendly n restaurants is very clean.'

author: Kalpesh Patel
text: 'Very nice clean place and very nice people and good foods'

author: niteshpatel niteshpatel
text: 'Very nice food and clean store and very nice stuff'

author: Jyosna Patel
text: 'This subway is very clean and very helpful service ...I like only that subway sendwich I am regular costmer that subway'

author: Josh Mayer
text:
'It is an OK place to go when you are in a rush and hungry for lunch. My favorite is the choice of different types of bread you would like to eat.

Lunchtime can have a line forming so prepare for that .

I find the ambiance here kinda like dead
column5: damp and need update.\n\nService is generic (neither bad or good)
column6: but it gets the job done.'

author: Abby W
text: "Yikes. Mediocre food
column5: mostly because the staff here gives customers less product than normal on your subs (4 or 5 pieces of meat instead of 6
column6: 3 pieces of cheese instead of 4 on a footlong
column7: etc). I don't know whether it's laziness or trying to cut corners to save money. I've visited this location 5 times
column8: and each time the employees are on their phones or joking and talking with each other
column9: paying little/no attention to the person buying the sub."

author: E8 MALAV
text: 'Nice employee good services care people fast worker clean subway'

author: Blanca Salas
text: 'Best food there'

author: Miss Marg
text: 'They give good service..\nHealthy and fresh food...'

author: Brandon Ralph Minichiello
text: 'This is the best subway ever. Really quick and staff is awesome! Rotisserie chicken sandwich is bangin!'

author: Rohan Gala
text: 'Nice restaurant'

author: Rima Patel
text: 'I have visited at afternoon. ...it was great service...very friendly employees ........store was very net and clean....fresh food....'

author: Jalaj Desai
text: 'Horrible customer service! Restrooms were not working. We couldnt even wash our hands! It closes at 8 pm but we were told that it we needed to be done by 6 as they were closing early. The temperature was 86 degrees in the restaurant and when we asked them to turn the AC on she said "its closing time". Pathetic!'

author: Jossue Ascencio
text: "Can't believe I had to wait 15 mins for 2 sandwiches i was the only customer and it was 3 ladys back there how does that happened and then the young one making my sandwich with a attitude smh damn near made me get a ticket"

author: jigs nakum
text: 'Very poor service I ever seen in subway.staff was not cooperative.'

author: M G
text: "They don't accept coupons from their Subways. Com or text coupons.\n\nOnline says they close at 9...i got there at 8 and they were closed..."

author: Rudri Buch
text: 'Very pleasant experience at this subway. The ladies that work there (Usha
column5: Vaishali and Kajal) are very friendly and efficient'

author: David Lee
text: 'Nice employees! Especially the two ladies at the counter. Quick preparation!'

author: Alpesh Patel
text:
'Very good place to eat.  I saw other people compliant about portion .  I have been visiting this place for a year.  Service is excellent and food
portion is plenty.  I have seen customer ask for so much mor.

that they cannot close the sandwich.'

author: Priyanka Patil
text: "One of the worst subway sandwiches I had. I love veggie delite at other places. The one I had here was made by a lady named 'Usha'.\nI wanted only a few ingredients like onion olives jalapenos.bell peppers. She sprinkled the small pieces of filling on the bread and when I asked more she said she was instructed to put only 6 small pieces of each. Then the sauce added was not even as much as a teaspoon.\nWhen I said why is she making the sandwich this way
column5: she said that is how they are trained. (I doubt
column6: I have really had good veggie delite at other places).\nWouldn't recommend this outlet to anyone."

author: Ravi Shah
text: 'Veggie lovers must go here'

author: Yesenia Sanchez
text: 'I only put a star to make a comment ! Horrible service not friendly . Make me loose my appetite. I comment these to my coworkers they all complaint the same things like 5 more people said horrible service.'

author: Gerry
text: 'Excellent service'

author: Leanna Accetta
text: "Terrible experience.  The workers aren't friendly
column5: they don't accept the coupons that were delivered to Hoboken residents and I feel that everything is over priced for the quality."

author: Shashi Joshi
text: 'One of the worst Subway outlet. Staff shows attitude as if we buying it for free.'

author: Andrew Price
text: "I have ordered here before with no problems
column5: but the last time we went here my wife ordered a footlong Meatball Marinara sub and they told her there's a 3 topping limit. :( This is the only subway where you can't add as many veggies as you'd like."

author: Samantha cosh
text: 'I go to the store all the time. It has a very welcoming staff
column5: they already now my order and are very attentive. The have great cookies.'

author: Peter Arnone
text: 'The service here is unbelievably bad.  I\'m not sure who owns this location
column5: but they should consider rehiring an entirely new staff.  I\'ve been here a few times now and usually the staff is unattached to what they are doing.  That\'s not the worst part.  It says everywhere that they close at 9pm
column6: however I have been there a few times at 8pm and they were closed.  So I finally decided to call one day before going to get a sandwich.  I called at 11am on a Saturday to make sure they were open.  I asked what time they closed.  The lady replied "it\'s going to be slow so we don\'t know what time we will close.  We will definitely not be here at night though".\n\nI\'m shocked that subway franchise has not pulled the rights from this owner yet.  I think they make decent sandwiches as a franchise
column7: this one is not worth visiting.  Save your time and money.  Go elsewhere!'

author: Max Wanders
text: 'I cannot begin to describe the disgust of poor customer service. They are like drones
column5: in fact a drone would probably give me better customer service.'

author: Craig De Souza
text: "They don't really have the skill you need to make a good sandwich.  I've eaten at many SUBWAY's and this was the only one at which I was disappointed by the sandwich."

author: Tracy James
text: 'Just ordered the tuna melt with ranch and tomato.  Clean
column5: healthy and low fat. Delicious.'

author: Acquin Dmello
text: 'Bad Service'

author: Mari Clifford
text: 'Great food! Yum!'

author: brian schimpfhauser
text: 'I just left a UPS package in this Subway. I called the shop I asked if they had the UPS package and they hung up. Real professional scumbags..'

author: Sanjeet Patel
text: 'Excellent food
column5: quick service and lots of seating'
